channel.title: Glory Online Allstar
channel.description:
[center]This advertisement page will be an ongoing project considering the server is still in beta stages. Also, I'm thinking to myself.. why didn't I post a thread in the 'Server Development' section a couple weeks back, but fuck it we're going to skip a step :eek:
Give me until the end of today to post media
[size=14pt][b]World 1:[/b][/size]
[size=16pt][b]Updates thus far:[/b][/size] [size=12pt]Full Torva with correct models, stats/bonuses, requirements, and examine info Almost Full Primal with correct models, stats/bonuses, requirements, and examine info (Also who would want full Promethium and other dungeoneering armor released ingame? Just out of curiosity.) Removed tons of dead code Custom dicing system [i]MOST[/i] dupes fixed Clue scroll system New agility area New skilling zone with access to most non-combat skills Completely re-done mining the mining skill and its code Abyss for runecrafting of all runes Full prestige system with benefits and titles! New custom godwars with 2 bosses (Saradomin and Bandos) and minions Full godsword shard connecting and smithing[/size]
[b][size=16pt]Updates I'm working on:[/size][/b] [size=12pt]More in-depth detail and content in each skill Fun Pk Zone w/ Fun Pk points and a Fun Pk point shop[/size]
Much more to be added... Forums: http://gloryonline.clan.su/forum [size=10pt][b] Beta Client v1: http://uppit.com/g8gvy9ecac1w/Glory_Online_Official_Beta_Client_v1.rar
Media: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/VXOR1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/O3lju.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/lK9Dk.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/DL20F.png[/img]
Check this page regularly for more info on the server[/center]

item.title: Glory Online Allstar
item.dc:creator: @Togasa Togasa
item.description:
@Togasa wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:13, topic:461662”][quote author=Togasa link=topic=564610.msg4126541#msg4126541 date=1350502890]

Please. Please please please. Don’t ruin allstar!

Lmfao how so? If anyone I made it alot better and it’s not even done it’s beta stages.
[/quote]
Torva? Spirit shields? I see…

You probably cleaned it but I’m talking about content-wise.[/quote]

Only a few things have been do so far content wise on the source you see in the media (again, I totally scratched it and am starting from scratch). That source had a tweaked woodcutting system and made it alot better and realistic. The mining was totally redone and works extremely well. Runecrafting is atleast 90% done including all runes (being accessible via the abyss), correct multiple runes crafted (similiar to RS). Thieving has a better system as well as herblore. The rest of the skills really havent been changed atm. I’m trying remake each skill so it isn’t just clicking an object

Read full topic

item.title: Glory Online Allstar
item.dc:creator: @Togasa Togasa
item.description:
@Togasa wrote:

The server is under beta and the client provided is completely compatible with the source you see in the pics, however I am in the process of completely re-doing the source shown above and re-adding all content. So you can use any ‘basic’ client to connect for now as their are no customs added at this point. Moparscape webclient/clients and almost any cheat client can connect.

Read full topic

item.title: Glory Online Allstar
item.dc:creator: @havocxwarloc havocxwarloc
item.description:
@havocxwarloc wrote:

[quote=“wimstr, post:8, topic:461662”][quote author=Togasa link=topic=564610.msg4124892#msg4124892 date=1350255134]

I need to check it.
I just need too… :rolleyes:

Allthough im not really torva stuff fan.

Check how? With your nuller’s?
[/quote]
Dude just checking out the server.
How you start, get good items etc.

Nothing you are thinking of.

EDIT: ok idk what is wrong but the client keeps kicking me out.
I log in and one second after i am back to log in screen.[/quote]
Frist of all im not a hater but The owner has the Wronge client type Or Cache Dowloader Uneed to fix that.

Read full topic

item.title: Glory Online Allstar
item.dc:creator: @Togasa Togasa
item.description:
@Togasa wrote:

[center]This advertisement page will be an ongoing project considering the server is still in beta stages.
Also, I’m thinking to myself… why didn’t I post a thread in the ‘Server Development’ section a couple weeks back, but fuck it we’re going to skip a step :eek:

Give me until the end of today to post media

[size=14pt]World 1:[/size]

[size=16pt]Updates thus far:[/size]
[size=12pt]Full Torva with correct models, stats/bonuses, requirements, and examine info
Almost Full Primal with correct models, stats/bonuses, requirements, and examine info
(Also who would want full Promethium and other dungeoneering armor released ingame? Just out of curiosity.)
Removed tons of dead code
Custom dicing system
MOST dupes fixed
Clue scroll system
New agility area
New skilling zone with access to most non-combat skills
Completely re-done mining the mining skill and its code
Abyss for runecrafting of all runes
Full prestige system with benefits and titles!
New custom godwars with 2 bosses (Saradomin and Bandos) and minions
Full godsword shard connecting and smithing[/size]

[size=16pt]Updates I’m working on:[/size]
[size=12pt]More in-depth detail and content in each skill
Fun Pk Zone w/ Fun Pk points and a Fun Pk point shop[/size]

Much more to be added…
Forums: http://gloryonline.clan.su/forum
[size=10pt][b]
Beta Client v1:
http://uppit.com/g8gvy9ecac1w/Glory_Online_Official_Beta_Client_v1.rar

Check this page regularly for more info on the server[/center]
